snippet: The Pelican Bay State Prison is one of California's most modern and most secure prisons. It is also, a Federal judge said yesterday, one of the most abusive.   In a 345-page ruling, Judge Thelton E. Henderson of Federal District Court in San Franc...
lead_paragraph: The Pelican Bay State Prison is one of California's most modern and most secure prisons. It is also, a Federal judge said yesterday, one of the most abusive. In a 345-page ruling, Judge Thelton E. Henderson of Federal District Court in San Francisco told of guards who assaulted prisoners in their cells with batons, high-voltage taser guns and rubber bullets, chaining them for hours in "fetal restraints" with their wrists bound to their ankles and regularly locking them up for more than 22 hours a day with virtually nothing to do.

headline.main: Judge Finds Inmate Abuse at Top-Security Prison in California
